display_long_description:
From the creators of Wooorld comes Where On Earth—a thrilling, fully social VR location-guessing game where your detective skills and knowledge of the world is put to the test!

Step into immersive real-world locations, search for clues, and pinpoint your location on the map. Play solo, cooperatively with friends, or head-to-head in intense team battles. Explore in 360°, using intuitive tools like the magnifier, compass and laser pointer to share insights and strategize in real time.

**How it works**:

**🔎 Explore & Investigate** – Jump to different 360° spots, zoom in on details, and analyze your surroundings for clues.

**📍 Make Your Guess** – Drop a pin on the map and lock in your answer. The closer you are, the higher you score!

**👥 Team Up or Compete** – Work together in Co-op Mode or challenge opponents in VS Mode, where teams battle to outguess each other.

**🌍 Social at its core** – Experience real multiplayer presence with 3D avatars, shared laser pointers, and fun mechanics like seamless teleportation.

Whether you're a geography pro or just love the thrill of discovery, Where On Earth offers an exciting way to test your skills and explore the world—without leaving home.

**Think fast, guess smarter, and prove you know the world!**
